sandra.libs.util.xmllib
Class RetrieveXMLTask

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      sandra.libs.util.xmllib.RetrieveXMLTask

public class RetrieveXMLTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>

Asynchronous task to retrieve the XML code from an URL. Parameters: - It receives a collection of Strings as input parameters - It does not produce any type of progress values (void) - It produces a String as a result of the background computation

Version:
1.3, 08/18/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear

onPostExecute

public void onPostExecute(java.lang.String xml)
Sends the results back to the invoking activity using the AsyncResponse instance "delegate" (see the AsyncResponse class). It is invoked when the background computation is finished.
